thread.title: Lower Valley's 'beauty bandit': police say he stole makeup from a Walgreens
thread.title_full: Lower Valley's 'beauty bandit': police say he stole makeup from a Walgreens

author: David Ibave
title: Lower Valley's 'beauty bandit': police say he stole makeup from a Walgreens
text:
EL PASO, Texas (KFOX14/CBS4) â€” El Paso police looking for a suspect who stole makeup from a Lower Valley drugstore.
According to Crime Stoppers of El Paso, authorities are looking for the man in the photographs as they believe he took several makeup products from Walgreens located at 8045 N. Loop, near N. Yarbrough Drive.
Crime Stoppers of El Paso said the incident happened at around 2:35 p.m. on Jan. 18.
RECOMMENDED: El Paso police seek vandals behind $7,500 damage to a Lower Valley park
Anyone with information regarding who's responsible for the damages is urged to call Crime Stoppers of El Paso at 915-566-8477 or drop a tip online at cselpaso.org .
Tipsters will remain anonymous and could get a cash reward if their tip leads to an arrest.
